languages.text: {n}Мало что можно понять из засыпанного снегом поля битвы, но, несомненно, Волки успели дать напоследок суровый бой. Сколы от выстрелов болтеров испещряют скалы, тут и там видны подпалины, оставленные плазменными зарядами.{/n}

{n}The snow-covered battlefield reveals little, but it is clear that the Wolves gave furious battle one last time. The rocks are pitted from bolter strikes, and here and there you see scorch marks left by plasma charges.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мало что можно понять из засыпанного снегом поля битвы, но, несомненно, Волки успели дать напоследок суровый бой. Сколы от выстрелов болтеров испещряют скалы, тут и там видны подпалины, оставленные плазменными зарядами.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The snow-covered battlefield reveals little, but it is clear that the Wolves gave furious battle one last time. The rocks are pitted from bolter strikes, and here and there you see scorch marks left by plasma charges.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}白雪皑皑的战场上，如今几乎看不出任何打斗的神迹，但很显然，狼群的最后一战竭尽了全力。岩石被爆矢枪打得坑坑洼洼，到处都是等离子炸弹留下的烧焦痕迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The snow-covered battlefield reveals little, but it is clear that the Wolves gave furious battle one last time. The rocks are pitted from bolter strikes, and here and there you see scorch marks left by plasma charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}白雪皑皑的战场上，如今几乎看不出任何打斗的神迹，但很显然，狼群的最后一战竭尽了全力。岩石被爆矢枪打得坑坑洼洼，到处都是等离子炸弹留下的烧焦痕迹。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}雪に覆われた戦場の状況はよく分からないが、狼が激しい戦いを終えたことは明らかだ。ボルターの攻撃を受けた岩はへこんでおり、そこかしこにプラズマ・チャージによる焼け跡が見られる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The snow-covered battlefield reveals little, but it is clear that the Wolves gave furious battle one last time. The rocks are pitted from bolter strikes, and here and there you see scorch marks left by plasma charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}雪に覆われた戦場の状況はよく分からないが、狼が激しい戦いを終えたことは明らかだ。ボルターの攻撃を受けた岩はへこんでおり、そこかしこにプラズマ・チャージによる焼け跡が見られる。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}El campo de batalla nevado no revela mucho, pero los Lobos libraron aquí una feroz batalla final. Las rocas están marcadas por disparos de bólter y ves varias de las marcas de quemadura propias de las cargas de plasma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The snow-covered battlefield reveals little, but it is clear that the Wolves gave furious battle one last time. The rocks are pitted from bolter strikes, and here and there you see scorch marks left by plasma charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El campo de batalla nevado no revela mucho, pero los Lobos libraron aquí una feroz batalla final. Las rocas están marcadas por disparos de bólter y ves varias de las marcas de quemadura propias de las cargas de plasma.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le champ de bataille recouvert de neige ne révèle pas grand-chose, mais il est évident que les Loups s'y sont battus férocement pour la dernière fois. Les rochers alentour sont constellés d'impacts de bolters et vous remarquez également des marques de brûlure laissées par des charges de plasma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The snow-covered battlefield reveals little, but it is clear that the Wolves gave furious battle one last time. The rocks are pitted from bolter strikes, and here and there you see scorch marks left by plasma charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le champ de bataille recouvert de neige ne révèle pas grand-chose, mais il est évident que les Loups s'y sont battus férocement pour la dernière fois. Les rochers alentour sont constellés d'impacts de bolters et vous remarquez également des marques de brûlure laissées par des charges de plasma.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das schneebedeckte Schlachtfeld verrät nicht viel, aber es ist klar, dass die Wölfe hier ein wildes letztes Gefecht ausgetragen haben. Felsen weisen Löcher von Bolter-Treffern auf, und du siehst Brandspuren von Plasmaladungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The snow-covered battlefield reveals little, but it is clear that the Wolves gave furious battle one last time. The rocks are pitted from bolter strikes, and here and there you see scorch marks left by plasma charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das schneebedeckte Schlachtfeld verrät nicht viel, aber es ist klar, dass die Wölfe hier ein wildes letztes Gefecht ausgetragen haben. Felsen weisen Löcher von Bolter-Treffern auf, und du siehst Brandspuren von Plasmaladungen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kanla kaplı çatışma alanı çoğu şeyi gizlese de Kurtların son kez hiddetli bir savaş verdiği bariz görülüyor. Bulonatar mermileri, taşları oymuş; sağda solda ise plazma saldırılarının bıraktığı yanık izleri var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The snow-covered battlefield reveals little, but it is clear that the Wolves gave furious battle one last time. The rocks are pitted from bolter strikes, and here and there you see scorch marks left by plasma charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kanla kaplı çatışma alanı çoğu şeyi gizliyor ama Kurtların son kez de olsa hiddetli bir savaş verdikleri bariz. Taşlar bulonatar mermilerinden dolayı oyulmuş ve sağda solda plazma saldırılarının bıraktığı yanık izleri var.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
